title: What's your best way to write your journal? - Quora

response.answer_text: During this summer, I got very into journaling. A few things I’ve learned: → Get supplies you like to use If you have a nice journal and pens that write nicely, you’ll be more motivated to write in your journal. This is something I’ve found to be worth investing a little bit in.  → Don’t compare your way of journaling to any others A journal is a pretty personal thing. However you do it is the best way, I promise. Don’t doubt or second guess yourself because it’s not the way other people may do it. → Figure out why you’re writing a journal Do you want to record what’s going on in now life so you can look back and compare 20 years into the future? Do you want an outlet for your thoughts and dreams? Figuring out what you want to do with your journal will help it be closer to what you’re looking for it to be. → Find inspiration online If you’re looking for ways to make your journal fancier, Pinterest is your best friend. There are plenty of ideas out there, and one might be just what you had in mine.  → Enjoy it! Everyone does journaling a little differently. If you don’t like writing long entries, don’t! If you feel like doing it differently some days, do that. If you want to number your pages, do that.  Color coding? Go for it! Fancy markers? Absolutely. Plain old words on paper? Fantastic. Hopefully this was helpful! :)
